bibl.title: Sappho, Iambist: Abusing the Brother.
The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Sappho and iambos. - Iambic moods and modes. - Iambos in the Brothers Poem. - Iambic Sappho and two Roman poets.
bibl.seg: Richard P. Martin, Sappho, Iambist: Abusing the Brother.

Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 110-126.

P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Sappho and iambos. - Iambic moods and modes. - Iambos in the Brothers Poem. - Iambic Sappho and two Roman poets.
